pullRequest.body:
Also restate `integral_finset` in terms of `IntegrableOn`
From PFR

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

<details>


Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11746245434/job/32725550602)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11746245434/job/32725550029)
Can you make this change for the lemma above as well

Similar to the earlier ones, let's add something like this:
```
lemma _root_.Set.Finite.integrableOn [MeasurableSingletonClass α] {μ : Measure α}
    [IsFiniteMeasure μ] {s : Set α} (hs : s.Finite) {f : α → E} : IntegrableOn f s μ := by
  simpa using IntegrableOn.finset (s := hs.toFinset)
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: any function is integrable on a finset wrt to a finite measure
